columns.sql: select s1.d, sessionnum from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select session_id, sessionnum from sessions s join inoutgsm i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 group by session_id, sessionnum) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)

select whole, summ from (select s.id as session_id, cast(s.startdatetime as date) as d, azscode from sessions s order by d) s1 left join (select i.session_id, sum(whole) as whole, sum(summ) as summ from sessions s join inoutitems i on s.id = i.session_id where s.azscode = :azscode and s.startdatetime >= :startdatetime and s.startdatetime <= :enddatetime + 1 and i.payment_code in (select code from paymentmodes where (rbm > 0 or caom > 0 or rnm > 0)) group by session_id, sessionnum) s2 on s1.session_id = s2.session_id where s1.azscode = :azscode and s1.d >= cast(:startdatetime as date) and s1.d <= cast(:enddatetime as date)
